text:
/LHVs/SNsGUIDELINES
80
Th e fi rst dose of Magnesium Sulphate injection:
/circle6 Magnesium Sulphate injection has been provided in your kit (Magnesium Sulphate 
50% w/v, 1 g in each 2 ml vial). 
/circle6 A 22-gauge needle and a 10 cc syringe has been provided in your kit. 
/circle6 Inform the woman, if she is conscious, that she may feel warm during the injection.
/circle6 Inject 10 ml (5 g) of Magnesium Sulphate in each buttock (a total of 20 ml (10 g). 
Ensure that this is given deep intramus
